Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 131st/Eberhart
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Indiana,134th, Langley, and 131st, due to street blockage near 131st/Eberhart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Indiana,134th, Langley, and 131st, due to street blockage near 131st/Eberhart.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 35th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 35th. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Kostner
ShortDescription: Eastbound 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt,Kostner,16th,and Pulaski due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Kostner.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt,Kostner,16th,and Pulaski due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Kostner.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
